Name: Hawaiian Martini
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered pineapple wedge and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Garnish with pineapple wedge and maraschino cherry.
Review: An aptly named fruity twist on the classic Martini.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2005 at the Four Seasons Hotel in Milan, Italy.
Nutrition: One serving of Hawaiian Martini contains 163 calories
